documents.document: @PatrickZircher Yeah you're right. It was luck.
@PatrickZircher It's not the skill of the art, but the graphic simplification of an expression/emotion + the accompanying words. Shrug.
@PatrickZircher Relatable emotion and empathy to connect with the audience in a scenario that is both familiar / identifiable with audience
@nellucnhoj It's a play on Quite Frankly I believe, he lives somewhere in Glasgow I think? :)
@RadFeenix Oh man, I'm sorry. I tweeted about this last night... hit the same thing D:
Animation AE Tip: Right Click frames > Interpret Footage > Main > Assume this frame rate: Set to 24 Frames per second. (Rather than 30!)
@hennygoransson This turned out amazingly - great stylisation throughout, love it.
@sgtmus Enough sleep is such an umbrella term right now, I will nap though, maybe rise about midday and get back to it.
Sleep or colour more frames. Colour more frames or sleep. Probably not paint more backgrounds. Probably sleep?
@ciaranlucas I dunno, I think he could at least handle an 'of'.
@Buttersphere @OldSwifty I'm told they'll see the light once the full animation is done. Not long til then :O
This is seriously so gosh darn good https://t.co/c1UbmiZPOf - #epic #working #soundtrack #undertale
@OldSwifty Aside from all the distractions and giggles from my side of the room you mean? :DDD
Just done colouring Arin frames 272 - 340 and compositing those into after effects, and Swifty has handed me 341 - 362 #animateagrump Phew.
@declanshalvey That's epic. Transformative and wonderfully done. Thanks for sharing :)
@EricSmack This is lovely <3 bwaaaaaahhhhh love the colours!
Fish finger sandwich.
@OldSwifty I thanked you in person for tweeting this but I realise I didn't on here! Thanks Swiftykins :3 So much fun working with you!
@hennygoransson envious of your colour tools there in toonage boomage - India is hogging her licence to animate.. soselfish. :P
Some of @OldSwifty 's smear frames are truly terrifying. #animateagrump.
@Ludolik @OldSwifty Haha yeah - he's gonna bust out a sweet sweet serenade solo... totes going to defeat that plant.. yup... defeat.. haha..
I really want an #office #cat - they could help in so many ways. https://t.co/yzYFAJKvcf
Current favourite google image search right now is '#cats typing at computer'
@moopdrea @OldSwifty Ohhhh, thank you! I'm Swift's support - I'm providing coloring, backgrounds, tea and cake. :3
A progress frame from @OldSwifty 's #animateagrump scene #spirals Hope all the other animators are doing okay, last… https://t.co/KVW3ePM2ml
@KuroUsagi_desu Looking great yo, I love the muted pastel colours you've gone for. :D
Painting my favourite thing right now, a mossy tiled floor. I love mossy tiled floors.
Grump room I'm painting as a backdrop for @OldSwifty 's #animateagrump #animation https://t.co/0vlRC4CyD6
@deathink Sweet work yo. Pink visor glow is a really great touch, liking the colour combo a lot. <3
It's @egoraptor 's #cutiesaturday so here's a sketch of the girl from North :) https://t.co/GRkEjSa3l4
Just animated a sparkle, am I a princess now?
Does anyone know of some cool online resources for learning melodies? I've been using youtube vids. https://t.co/DjVBax7ehB via @YouTube
https://t.co/ZpZDze9nwx - Great podcast I was listening to earlier about working in collaborative teams - lot's of great advice and insight
@Jerzy @OldSwifty Great great podcast guys, really informative. Yeah, said it fine :D
I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/tdYppohEsy LIA Cast 173 - What You Add to the Team
@Jerzy @OldSwifty @LeanIntoArt Oh wow, that's awesome! Not to worry my name is deceptive. I think it's like toy- with a g tagged on. :D
I liked a @YouTube video https://t.co/HDiEbiZ6c4 His Theme (WARNING: SAD)
Help support the Brain Research Trust, fund @TheSonsieBogle to run in April - https://t.co/JMj1jYsEsp #charity #funding #london #marathon
@R0mbag @nellucnhoj I'm out of the loop on that, what did JonTron do that broke you?
@nellucnhoj @Treestumped I think with more creator owned funding pools, people are factoring in creators more into the equation
@charactercube @tapas_app Yeah Kenneth - we've set up a store on big cartel, almost done linking accounts in order to accept payments.
@OldSwifty That's great, lovely use of space. I love his cheeky smile / expression in the beginning. <3
Superb animation from @OldSwifty her character Jove from Girl and the Glim sneaking in some guitar jammin' https://t.co/BuZvoP5bWI
@charactercube That's awesome dude!
As soon as I figure out how to get a #gif out of @Krita_Painting it's so on.
New jump up Morning Jam 7 - Swift Love, Improvised jam on a little melody for @OldSwifty - https://t.co/HH0uOLiDUZ via @YouTube
It's really cool to see the diversity being shown for #animateagrump Wow!
@OldSwifty @Jerzy I read the Pickles and Taft mini comic, they're so adorable together. Bwah <3
charliebowater's photo https://t.co/AOAD1h6D8b
oldswifty's photo https://t.co/9PxZDkxxOm
@FaithErinHicks Yeaahhh Colm Wilkinson as Valjean <3 Such a tenderness to his quieter pieces - 10th anniversary features the original cast.
@FaithErinHicks Oh jeez, which version are you listening to? 10th anniversary version is my jam.
@ComicPrintingUK 2019: Trump sounds like a Comic Title in the making
@oldswifty Can hunt and locate my imperfect fills in her frames from 40 yards. Somehow draws fingernails on the gloves of her animation.
Morning Jam 6 - Swifty Intro: https://t.co/GqWqRjhi0d via @YouTube
@Treestumped @TheWarblazer Oh wow, this is the second color pass I've seen on this piece, it's giving me the itch... :D Lovely work!
Had no idea that #coloristappreciationday existed and stumbling upon at the end of it! New goal: make great work in time for next years

@Zednek101 @OldSwifty @Krita_Painting Dude, India will be pleased to know you got the likeness :D i'm looking forward to seeing it too :)

That looks phenomenal, gonna give this a read. Wow! https://t.co/CwvHfJ0HHT

@devanmusedesign saga is published by image, image have a looooot of great creator owned series. Black science is up there #ComicBookHour
@ComicBookHour #comicbookhour webcomics are the way for indie creators to cut their teeth on the process of storytelling to a wide audience!
@ComicBookHour Q1: I read a lot of indie comics published on the @tapas_app tapastic platform, great community over there. Lots of support.
